snippet: The Czech Republic retained its Davis Cup title as Radek Stepanek exploited the inexperience of Dusan Lajovic in the decisive match to seal a 3-2 victory over Serbia.
abstract: Czech Republic defeats Serbia to retain its Davis Cup title, as Radek Stepanek exploits inexperience of Dusan Lajovic in decisive match to seal 3-2 victory.
lead_paragraph: The Czech Republic retained its Davis Cup title as Radek Stepanek exploited the inexperience of Dusan Lajovic in the decisive match to seal a 3-2 victory over Serbia.

headline.main: Czechs Retain Davis Cup on Stepanek’s Easy Win
headline.print_headline: Czechs Retain Davis Cup On Stepanek’s Easy Win
